channel.title: Posts on Lewis' Very Cool Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Lewis' Very Cool Blog

item.title: Phantom Power Capsule
item.author: contact@lewissteentjes.com (Lewis Steentjes)
item.description: Something I like doing in my free time is catching up with my friends using VOIP software like Skype (RIP) or Discord. For years I’ve been using a dinky little microphone that I bought from Dick Smith (also RIP) when I was 14. Here’s what it looks like: Now, I don’t really think it’s fair on my friends to have to put up with that so a while ago I bought myself a cheap BM-800 condenser microphone from AliExpress along with a microphone stand for it.
item.dc:creator: Lewis

item.title: Initial Commit
item.author: contact@lewissteentjes.com (Lewis Steentjes)
item.description: This is my first blog post, a test to make sure I’ve set this up correctly and can start learning how to make new posts in markdown. I’ve been interested in the idea of making a website for a while now. Recently, I came across a YouTube video by Chris Titus where he shows his workflow for making blogposts on his blog using Netlify to host his static Hugo site.
item.dc:creator: Lewis
